name: Speed Cargo (Sygma)
description:
A game developed by Sygma Kyle & fn_nofe

Speed Cargo is a strategic speedrun game about delivering cargo as fast as possible.  Plan your route to get the fastest time.

Made for MSGJ-1 game jam.

Inspired by Hideo Kojima's Death Stranding and Activision's Crash Team Racing

You basically have to transport the cargo from point A to point B, simple.

Controls:
WASD for movement
F to hold a cargo
V for the main menu
ESC graphics settings
Mouse to look around
Space bar to jump
Shift to sprint
